author: rdonkin
msg: Created new exception so that problems with the bean access langauges can be trapped separately.

author: rdonkin
msg: Now check for JVM version so that the warning message is only displayed when the JVm is potentially vunerally. Also, improved the way the warning message is phrased. This is in response to some users becoming confused by the previous message.

author: rdonkin
msg: Applied patch that prevents unit test errooneously failing on computers with comma as the decimal deliminater. Submitted by Rune Toalango Johannesen.

author: rdonkin
msg: Rolled back last commit. Accidentally committed everything in commons when I just wanted to commit docs and xdocs. Doh!

author: rdonkin
msg: Changed charter as per successful VOTE. We now allow any Apache committers to use the sandbox (upon request).
